title: Low Priority Queue keeps Resetting!
body:
I can't play a single game because past 2-5 minutes of low priority queue the timer goes back to 19 minutes of waiting needed.

I was watching a video to let time pass, I checked the time, it was at 15 minutes and then after few mins (far less than 10) I go back to the client and see a 17 minutes wait time. The time to open the LoL site and checking again and it's back to 19 minutes wait time.

** >Edit< **

Possible solution: Restarting the client made the queue not resetting anymore.

replies.body: It sounds like you might still be having some connection issues and losing comms with matchmaking while waiting in the lower priority queue.  I recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this by strengthening your network and clearing it of instabilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I think I found what triggered it:

I interrupted the queue and re-queued a few times before this issue happened. After this issue was clear I tried to close and open again the client and all got fixed.
Hey my account did the same thing except that after a few secs when it resets the timer window disappears and all is well again.. got me scared tho

i am having the same issue: I have a 20 min low priority queue, whenever it's 8-7 min. it goes back to 20 min. this is devastating.... restarting the client did not help.. and i do not have connection issues..

I am having this same issue. I literally cannot play a single game because the timer keeps resetting after about 5-6min into the 20min Queue. Every single time.

I have restarted the client and it changed nothing, and I have tried to use that hextech tool, but I live in a border town on the Mexican side, so it doesn't support my location.

Any other possible tips? I have zero issue actually waiting out the 20mins, if I can ever get it to actually finish and allow me to complete my punishment.

Unfortunately I don’t have any :S 

Resetting the clien fixed it and I’ve never encountered that again.
I had it too, restarting the client ended it, as you said.
I am having this same exact issue its ridiculous..

:D, just posted something like this [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gNkkYBHZ-client-low-priority-queue-is-going-higher-than-20). A 2-5 min queue is very short. I just waited 32min in my 20min queue.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
